title: still dont have the summoner icon
body: the weekend is over now and i still dont have 10 year anniversary icon... why not?

replies.body: There are a lot of eligible accounts to send gifts out to so it's going to be a bit of time for this to wrap up.  You won't get everything all at once per our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-).  Everything will be coming!

The gifts are not yet done being distributed, so just hang tight. The final day to receive them is the 23rd.

> Due to the nature of this particular gift and the way it varies by account, we’re not able to simultaneously grant it to everyone. This means it may take a few days for the gift to show on your account. We’re asking for a bit of patience through next week as we pick up all the stragglers—if you don’t have it by 9/23, let Player Support know. Additionally, players using the alpha League client may receive the gift but not a notice—double-check your account before opening a ticket. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/riot-games/announcements/thank-you
